thread.title: BRIEF-Far EasTone Telecommunications announces 2017 dividend payment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Far EasTone Telecommunications announces 2017 dividend payment

organizations.name: reuters) - far eastone telecommunications co ltd

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Far EasTone Telecommunications Co Ltd
* Says it will use undistributed profit to pay cash dividend of T$3.037 per share to shareholders for 2017
* Says it will use additional paid-in capital to distribute T$0.713 per share
* Says it will pay cash dividend of T$12.22 billion in total
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/u9cSDm
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
